name: Code Refactoring Request
about: Create a suggestion or idea related to code refactoring
title: "[CODE_REFACTORING]"
labels: code quality, suggestion

---

**Description**
Describe the issue or code section that needs refactoring briefly.

**Refactoring Objective**
State the main goal of this refactoring.

**Suggested Approach**
Provide any suggested approaches or ideas for the refactoring.

**Code Sample**
If applicable, include a code snippet related to the issue.

**Expected Improvements**
Describe the expected improvements after the refactoring.

**Additional Context**
Provide any additional context or information that might be relevant.
